Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Crowd for Angels Says Allo, Allo, Allo to First Private Token Sale  Crowd for Angels, one of the UK’s leading crowdfunding platforms for shares, crowd bonds and tokens, is delighted to announce the upcoming launch of its first private token sale, for online fraud prevention business CryptoPolice. Having met with the management team and after applying its rigorous due diligence process to the company, Crowd for Angels will put the sale live on Thursday, July 12.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/crowd-for-angels-says-allo-allo-allo-to-first-private-token-sale/

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: On the 12th July, we will be launching our first Private Token Sale for CryptoPolice, an online fraud prevention business on Crowd for Angels. For me, this will be the cumulation of months of hard work of the team and partners to deliver the goals we set out. I cannot wait and hope others will join us on this journey. #Excited #Crypto  Read more here: https://crowdforangels.com/blog/crowd-for-angels-says-allo-allo-allo-to-first-private-token-sale/

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Quote from: Jankhot on March 20, 2018, 04:05:43 PM Are you sure your company to become a bigger company in the future? and whether future prospects will be assured. hopefully be one of the best companies Quote from: Conel85 on March 20, 2018, 04:29:43 PM Read the draft and did not know what to say. I have a big doubt. IS THIS A SCAM?   Thought it would be good to bundle all questions together :  1) Our site has been fully operational since 2014 - you can access it here: https://crowdforangels.com/. We are an FCA-regulated firm and we also have an integrity to maintain.  2) We do hope this is a success. It is a great idea and there is a lot of demand for crowdfunded bonds.  3) Ofc, no one should ever make guarantees because there are always risks involved however we are an established crowdfunding platform based in London, authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) (176508). By offering the ICO via a Bond Issue, we have committed to investors a return of capital, payment of interest and free ANGEL tokens - which makes it arguably scam-free.  Jinu @CfA

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Crowd for Angels ICO Progressing Ahead of Schedule  Crowdfunding platform Crowd for Angels is pleased to announce that is making progress in advancing its unique “Liquid Crypto Bond” issue and Initial Coin Offering (ICO) of its ANGEL tokens. The company is looking to raise up to £50 million through the bond issue and is issuing free ANGEL tokens to investors as a reward for their participation.  Investment highlights  ·        The 5 year bond is offering an inflation-beating* 4% p.a.  ·        The bond can be held in an Innovative Finance ISA (IF-ISA) for tax-free returns.  ·        Investors in the bond will receive up to 99 free ANGEL tokens per pound (£) invested. ANGEL tokens are a form of cryptocurrency, built using Ethereum ERC-20 standards.  ·        The ANGEL token is live and investors will receive these shortly after the offer closes.  ·        Investors can invest as little as £100 using their debit card, bank transfer or crypto.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/crowd-for-angels-ico-ahead-of-schedule/

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: @Vladdirescu87 - Thanks for sharing this!   Jinu@CfA

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Angel Tokens listed on the exchange GetBTC! - All done ahead of investors getting their tokens -  We are glad to be delivering on our promises    Get your ANGEL tokens on https://getbtc.org/  Jinu@CfA

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Crowd for Angels Bond Offer Update and Token Trading Begins  Crowd for Angels, one of the UK’s leading platforms for equity and debt crowdfunding, is delighted to announce that it has successfully closed its Liquid Crypto Bond and Initial Coin Offering (ICO). The funds raised will be invested in a variety of crowd bond issues listed on the Crowd for Angels platform, helping a range of small businesses to finance the next stage of their growth plans.  Investors in the bond have now received their “ANGEL” tokens, which are able to be traded on crypto exchange GETBTC https://getbtc.org. The tokens are currently trading at a price of 2,785,129 ANGEL tokens to 1 Bitcoin, giving the 5 billion tokens in issue a market cap of £9.82 million at current exchange rates.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/crowd-for-angels-bond-offer-update-and-token-trading-begins/

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: You can invest in the Liquid Crypto Bond by visiting: https://crowdforangels.com/ICO and clicking Register Here.  Andrew@CfA

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Quote from: Gober33 on March 19, 2018, 07:18:12 PM Do not understand how the capital raised will be invested into secured crowd bonds. You mentioned, portfolio of secured bonds, what type of security?  Hi Gober33 and Dany333,  The £50 million will be used to invest in a portfolio of secured bonds, these bonds are generated by the Crowd for Angels platform and have gone through our vetting and due diligence process.  Security is generally fixed asset-backed e.g. property, vehicles and stock however in a few rare cases we also take a floating charge over the company.  Thank you for the question  Andrew@CfA

Our site has been fully operational since 2014 - you can access it here: https://crowdforangels.com/  Yes the token has been fully developed and can be viewed here on etherscan: https://etherscan.io/address/0xf150b9054013552a6288320dc4afe1beebb79d8e

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Quote from: Dofab on March 16, 2018, 07:06:47 PM There are many questions, but I want to ask the main one. Why are you seeking £50million? I hope for an answer. Thank you. Quote from: Tulb on March 19, 2018, 09:30:21 AM Everything is clear, but there are issues. Do the teams get any tokens?  It's probably a little quicker for me to Bundle a few of the questions together  1) The minimum investment is £100 - for £100 investors will receive 9,000 tokens and 100 bonds paying 4% p.a.  2)  All of the funds raised by the bond will be used to invest in a portfolio of secured bonds via the Crowd for Angels platform and thus create and promote liquidity.  3) None of the token or funds raised will be given or used for the Team. If the team wants tokens, we have to invest alongside investors in the same deal. [Which I have ]  Andrew@CfA

Author: Erlinda Santiago
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: This is interesting especially the ann project By the way what will be the effect of this project to bitcoin? I hope you answer my question thank you

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Hi Erlinda,  In terms of its addition to the bitcoin, it will not add to the overall architecture but will feed into the ecosystem. We believe this because, we are aiming to build a token of stable value, making it user-friendly for a wider audience. Furthermore, as a regulated platform, users can trust our company and our processes, again hopefully attracting more ordinary users to Bitcoin, blockchain and this method of decentralised transacting.  Andrew @ CfA

Author: Rabby637
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: This project looking like am interesting project But you tell that the token has no nominal value at issue. It can be freely traded on your platform. What will be price of it?? Who can control or increase it's price??

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Good Question Rabby, well like most "Currencies" our token will be priced by the market (supply/demand), to create demand, we have obligated to have part of the fees we receive from companies paid in ANGEL tokens thus creating demand and a price.  To cement this price, when Crowd for Angels receives these tokens, rather than selling them back to the market to receive our fees, we will take these tokens out of Circulation.  Therefore, with no nominal value to the token initially, the only way is UP!

Body: Your 22 pages Whitepaper is really worth a read. Professionally written. The only question I have in mind now is when is when are you going to have the crowdsale for your ICO?

Body: Thank you, and for those who have not yet read the whitepaper, you can download a copy here: https://crowdforangels.com/pdf/Crowd_for_Angels_Whitepaper.pdf  We expect the Crowdsale to take place between the 15th & 19th January 2018, please make sure you have registered on our site or joined our telegram channel to keep updated.

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Whilst, it does break away from the traditional ICO funding method of sending BTC to a wallet, I like to think of it as a more traditional method of transacting, like buying a good from amazon or ebay. With our system and payment gateways, you simply choose the amount you would like to invest, accept the agreement and selected the payment method that suits you.  After all, the company should work for the customer.  Andrew @ CfA

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: [ANN] I am delighted to announce the appointment of Henry Watkinson as Advisor  Henry is a director at Headstart Advisers Ltd, an independently owned investment advisory company specialising in Alternative Investments.  Prior to joining Headstart in 2002, Henry worked for Credit Suisse Asset Management in Sydney specialising in Futures and Fixed Income, having previously supported the top performing Fund Manager at Morgan Stanley.  Henry has a long track record in asset management and will be in invaluable to us as we proceed with our Initial Coin Offering

Author: moonblocks
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: What happens to the unsold tokens if the hardcap is not reached?  I was a little surprised at the simplicity of the OP as most include company details, team + Linkedin profiles, and social media links, etc. just to make it easier for investors to learn more about who you are and what you are offering at first glance, however there's nothing wrong with doing something different

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: We only mint the amount of tokens required by the raise, therefore there will be no tokens left over.  Thank you for your feedback on the OP, the team and I can see ways to improve it.  Andrew@CFA

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Hi Everyone, I thought I would share the news with you that before the New Year, AIM Listed Legendary Investments took a stake in Crowd for Angels to support our Liquid Crypto Bond - I have shared the RNS below.  -- START--  "Legendary Investments PLC Thursday said that it has entered into an agreement to acquire 9.7% of crowdfunding firm Crowd for Angels UK Ltd at a post money valuation of GBP3.7 million.  The 9.7% stake will be paid for through the issuance of 248 million Legendary shares to Crowd for Angels.  Crowd for Angels launched in 2014, and was among the first crowdfunding platforms to become FCA regulated, and one of the first to be approved by HMRC to manage the Innovative Finance ISA, and has launched its own Liquid Crypto Bond with attached crypto-tokens through an initial coin offering.  Crowd for Angels Founder & Director Tony De Nazareth said: "Crowd for Angels is very pleased to welcome Legendary Investments on board as a strategic investor in the business. Moving into the New Year we are excited about the plans we have for the company. We will be focusing on raising the money for our unique Liquid Crypto Bond, along with continuing to help a range of growth businesses to raise the funds they need for expansion."  Legendary Executive Chairman Zafar Karim said: "We are delighted to be investing in Crowd for Angels. The platform has been at the forefront of its sector and continues to be so with the launch of its GBP50 million Liquid Crypto Bond. We expect to work with Crowd for Angels by sharing ideas and opportunities, and look forward to helping Crowd for Angels reach its potential."  Legendary shares were up 44% at 0.19 pence per share on Thursday."  -- END --

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Hi There, yes I can appreciate that it is not the standard USD or ETH. This is because we are a UK platform, therefore all the funds will be settled in GBP and the subscription agreement is in GBP.  The Project will be available outside the UK and investors can pay in ETH, BTC, LTC and DASH. Our platform will automatically calculate the conversion rate of the £ and the chosen currency (ETH, BTC, LTC and DASH) when making a payment via our CoinPayments gateway - No need to send funds to a wallet  Andrew @ CfA

Author: kyanscadiel
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Almost all ICO is using ETH for their transactions, how come your company uses £ instead of ETH?

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Hi Kyanscadiel,  Very good question, unlike traditional ICOs where the funds are generally being raised for development purposes and therefore a bit of fluctuation will not hurt the project overall, our Liquid Crypto Bond, is a loan from investors to the company and therefore we have an obligation to pay it back. Thus, we need to settle in a currency not prone to fluctuation.  Furthermore, as a UK company, the funds settle in GBP (£) and is why we quote £'s rather than ETH or BTC  Investors can pay in GBP, ETH, BTC, LTE, Dash and other Fiats and the correct rate will be calculated for you.

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: The price is £1 per bond.  If you invest during the pre-ICO, you will get 99 ANGEL Tokens per pound invested. If you invest during the ICO, you will get 90 tokens per pound.  * Minimum investment in the Pre-ICO is £5,000

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Hi Hadang,  The ICO project is to raise a corporate bond, whereby the funds will be re-invested in other secured bonds on our platform. This will help grow and establish the market. And in return, we pass our fees back to investors through buybacks.  The website is fully operational and we are not looking for development finance.  Andrew @ CfA

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: https://preview.ibb.co/dRKPfn/Bitcoin_CFA8.png  We would like to announce the launch of Crowd for Angels Pre-ICO for our Liquid Crypto Bond. It is the first ICO from a regulated company and provides, what we hope is a welcomed addition to the market. Please visit https://crowdforangels.com/ICO to find out more information and to download our whitepaper.  Crowd for Angels (CfA) proposes to raise up to £50 million through a 5-year Liquid Crypto Bond paying 3% interest per annum. The purpose of the raised funds would be to support SMEs seeking capital via the Crowd for Angels Platform. The capital raised will be invested into secured crowd bonds. For every £1 invested, 100 tokens will be mined by Crowd for Angels. Up to 99 of these tokens will be issued to the initial investors as rewards, with Crowd for Angels retaining the balance. This bond will enable investors to get exposure to a secured underlying asset along with diversification benefits through the crypto offering.  1) Investors invest in a Bond (security) via our platform with the token given as a gift (reward). All funds will be held in fiat in a segregated account in a major UK bank.  2) ANGEL token has no nominal value at the time of issue. It can be freely traded (after issue) and used on our platform once a value is established.  3) Value Creation – When a business raises finance through our platform, they pay a “funding facility fee” (usually ranging from 2-4% for debt finance). Crowd for Angels will use 1% to purchase Angel Tokens from the exchange market and burn it leading to a reduction in the overall supply. Instead of receiving these tokens to pay our fees, we take them out of circulation and this will cement the value created during purchase.  Finally, any investments will be made via our platform. We will NOT ask investors to send Crypto to our wallet.  Please visit https://crowdforangels.com/ICO to find out more information and to download our whitepaper.  Whitepaper here: https://crowdforangels.com/pdf/Crowd_for_Angels_Whitepaper.pdf  We are on Telegram - https://t.me/CrowdforAngels

Author: Altcner
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: This project looks promising, what can we expect from you in the nearest future ?)

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: In the immediate future, we will be attending a few events to meet with innovators and investors. This is to help raise capital but also to inform the ecosystem about our product and how as a regulated entity it is being rolled out. In this, we will also be arranging meetings, webinars, newsletters, press releases and comments on the sector. Hopefully, a few of the national press outlets will see how this "Liquid Crypto Bond" can welcome the wider audience to the crypto world.  As for the platform, we will see a few more companies come online and seek capital, these will be promoted to our base of investors. We continue to listen to feedback, develop and improve the site.  Finally, the Smart Contract development is continuing and will need to undergo two (2) separate audits before release.  Hopefully, you can join us on this journey

Author: tianyi321
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: how much is your soft and hard cap? Can anyone take part in the pre sale? what is pre-sale minimal size of investments?

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: We do not have a soft cap as we can utilize all funds raised but we have set a hard cap of £50 million. Anyone can take part in the pre-sale, however, there is a minimum investment of £5,000. This can be in Fiat, BTC, ETH, DASH and LTC  It should be worth noting that the investment is through the platform and investors will need to complete KYC checks upfront.

Author: kyanscadiel
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: You mentioned about the funding facility fee, what percentage of angel token it would be? Do you think this is canvenient for the investors? I think i'd better walkthrough your white paper to understand more of the project.

Author: hadang
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: ANN too short, very little information. When will the pre-ICO start and the minimum amount of money can be invested into the project? What is the value of the token?

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: The Funding Facility Fee, is a fee that companies pay to Crowd for Angels for raising capital for them. The fee ranges from 2% to 4% for a bond and 6% for equity of the amount raised through the platform (https://crowdforangels.com/fees). Companies will need to pay 1% (up to 50% of the fee) of the funds raised in Angel Tokens.  This will mean that the tokens will need to be purchased in the market, creating demand and a price for the token.  Once Crowd for Angels receives the tokens, rather than selling them back to the market to collect our fee in Fiat, we will sacrifice this part of our fee and take the tokens out of circulation.

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: The pre-ICO launched on the 23rd November and will be open until the 29th December. The minimum investment in this round is £5,000 and for every £1 invested the investor will receive 99 ANGEL tokens.  There is no nominal value to the token at issue, however, the bond that is issued is worth £1. Bonds will be issued at £0.98 in the £1 at pre-sale (2% discount) for those investing above £90,000

Author: quadcopter
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: can you explain the roadmap about this project??

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: Certainly, We are an already established platform that has been funding companies the traditional way of reaching out to investors for individual projects for a number of years. Therefore the Roadmap focuses on raising capital, deploying the tokens and delivering returns.  November - Launched Pre-ICO Jan 2018 - Release Tokens to Pre-ICO investors Jan 2018 - First round of funds begin to be deployed into companies and fees begin to be paid Jan 2018 - Open ICO to the Crowd Feb 2018 - Tokens available to be traded on 3 exchanges Feb 2018 - Second round of funds begin to be deployed Jan 2019 - First bonds mature and funds re-invested 2022 - £1 Billion worth of bonds funded via the platform  We hope that as we fulfil more bonds via our platform and the ecosystem grows, the fees will increase thus delivering strong returns to investors holding the tokens. These tokens then can be used as a store of value, used to purchase investment on Crowd for Angels or freely traded.

Author: francesyrus
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: We have reached out to GBX, Gatecoin and Liqui as preferred choices, but we are contacting others to increase the number of exchanges. We are also very fortunate that we have an internal exchange for our bonds which investors can use. We hope to add the ANGEL coins to that as well.  Thank you for the vote of confidence!

Author: Mysterious01
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: I visited your website to look for more information as the post is very limited one. So your team is from UK and you launched last 2014. Why it takes you almost three years before launching this ICO?

Author: CrowdforAngels
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] Liquid Crypto Bond, Crowd for Angels (FCA)
Body: First, thank you for visiting the website (crowdforangels.com). To answer your questions, Yes, we are a team that is based in the UK and had launched the platform in 2014.  As we mentioned in the whitepaper, the funds aren't being raised to establish or develop the company. This critical part has already been taken care of and we are an operational and regulated crowdfunding platform. We actually started looking at the crypto world, to allow international investments into companies on our platform via a crypto payment gateway. This has then lead to the creation of the Liquid Crypto Bond (Our ICO), with all the funds raised being used to invest in companies via the platform.  In turn, we will increase revenues and increase fees, which will deliver value back to the token holders.
